001/** This file contains the logic required to get a list of products and toppings from database
002 * @author Shruti Oruganti
003 */
004package src.data;
005
006import java.sql.*;
007import java.util.*;
008import src.database.db_connect;
009import src.model.product;
010
011/**
012 * This class fetches the product information from the database
013 */
014public class product_data {
015
016    /**
017     * This function takes a query and formats the results of the query into the product class objects for easier backend handling of orders
018     * @param query
019     * @return A list of products derived from results of the query
020     */
021    private static List<product> getProducts(String query) {
022
023        Connection conn = null;
024        try {
025            conn = db_connect.getConnection();
026        } catch (SQLException e) {
027            e.printStackTrace();
028        }
029        List<product> products = new ArrayList<>();
030        Statement stmt = null;
031        try {
032            stmt = conn.createStatement();
033        } catch (SQLException e) {
034            e.printStackTrace();
035        }
036        ResultSet rs = null;
037        try {
038            rs = stmt.executeQuery(query);
039        } catch (SQLException e) {
040            e.printStackTrace();
041        }
042  
043        try {
044            while (rs.next()) {
045                products.add(new product(
046                    rs.getInt("productid"),
047                    rs.getString("productname"),
048                    rs.getDouble("price")
049                ));
050            }
051        } catch (SQLException e) {
052            e.printStackTrace();
053        }
054        return products;
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * The function returns a products list that contains all the toppings in the database
059     * @return product list that contains all the toppings in the database
060     */
061    public static List<product> getDrinks() {
062        return getProducts("SELECT * FROM products WHERE productid > 200");
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * The function returns a products list that contains all the drinks in the database
067     * @return product list that contains all the drinks in the database
068     */
069    public static List<product> getToppings() {
070        return getProducts("SELECT * FROM products WHERE productid > 100 AND productid <= 200");
071    }
072}
